roles.title: CEO/Chair of Board
roles.description: A chief executive officer, the highest-ranking person in a company or other institution, ultimately responsible for making managerial decisions.

roles.title: COO/VP Operations
roles.description: The chief operating officer (COO) is responsible for executing and implementing the operational directives set by the CEO and the board of directors.

roles.title: CFO/VP Administration
roles.description: A chief financial officer, a senior executive with responsibility for the financial affairs of a corporation or other institution. The vice president of administration position is responsible for directing all of the administrative functions of the corporation in accordance with industry standards, where applicable, regulatory agencies, as appropriate and company objectives and policies.

roles.title: CIO
roles.description: Chief Information Officer (CIO), chief digital information officer (CDIO) or information technology (IT) director is a job title commonly given to the most senior executive in a bank responsible for the traditional information technology and computer systems that support bank goals.

roles.title: VP Client Services
roles.description: Responsible for the Consumer Banking division performing a variety of roles including lending, investing, risk management, marketing, and technology. Their team provides a suite of solutions to help retail and commercial customers meet their financial goals.

roles.title: VP Marketing
roles.description: Responsible for the overall strategic marketing plans for an entire organization in order to attract potential customers and retain existing ones.

roles.title: Director Human Resources
roles.description: Responsible for organizational development, recruitment and staffing, employment law, performance management, employee relations, and compensation and benefits.

roles.title: Director Financial and Audit Services
roles.description: Sometimes called a compliance manager, ensures that a company is conducting its business in compliance with laws, regulations, and professional standards.

roles.title: Director Legal Services/General Counsel
roles.description: The senior executive managing legal affairs for the company.

roles.title: Director Information Technology
roles.description: Manages IT infrastructure, operations, and services, ensuring that businesses and individuals can access and make use of data and services.

roles.title: Director Information Security and CISO
roles.description: A chief information security officer (CISO) is the senior-level executive responsible for establishing and maintaining the bank's security vision, strategy, and program to ensure information assets and technologies are adequately protected.

roles.title: Director Accounting
roles.description: Responsible for analysis and reconciliation of accounts and in development and implementation of accounting policies, procedures, and controls.

roles.title: Director Physical Security
roles.description: Responsible for identifying, assessing, and integrating physical security operations, technology, and policy solutions at the organization.

roles.title: Manager, Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery
roles.description: Develops, maintains, and implements business continuity and disaster recovery strategies, including risk assessments, business impact analyses, and documentation of procedures.

roles.title: Manager, Internal Audit
roles.description: Performs full audits including risk management, control management, and assessing financial reliability to ensure compliance within company systems.

roles.title: Manager, Security Architecture
roles.description: Designs and oversees the implementation of security measures for an organization's information systems, ensuring compliance with policies and resistance to threats.

roles.title: Manager, Operational Risk
roles.description: Monitors, handles, and measures operational and economic risk exposures to minimize risk and place appropriate controls in place.

roles.title: Manager Purchasing
roles.description: Leads global procurement efforts to maximize value from suppliers and support business objectives.

roles.title: Manager, Customer Experience and Community Engagement
roles.description: Improves customer experiences to foster loyalty and increase satisfaction through high-quality interactions.

roles.title: Manager of Sales
roles.description: Leads a sales team by providing training, setting sales goals, analyzing data, and building the team.

roles.title: Manager of Marketing
roles.description: Develops and executes strategic marketing plans to attract potential customers and retain existing ones.

roles.title: Manager, IT End User Service Desk
roles.description: Manages daily operations of the service desk, leads the team, and ensures continuous improvement of service.

roles.title: Manager, End User Computing
roles.description: Provides operational day-to-day support for end-user computing services across the organization.

roles.title: Manager, IT Telecom, and Infrastructure
roles.description: Oversees daily operations of telecom and infrastructure support staff, ensuring business and IT service needs are met.

roles.title: Manager, Data Center and Hosting Services
roles.description: Manages day-to-day operations of the datacenter, contracts cloud services, and ensures data availability.

roles.title: Manager, Risk Management
roles.description: Identifies, assesses, and mitigates risks that could impact an organization's assets, profitability, or existence.

roles.title: Incident Coordinator
roles.description: Manages unplanned interruptions, malfunctions, and IT service issues, ensuring restoration of services and reporting to management.

roles.title: Service Desk Analyst
roles.description: First point of contact for technical issues, troubleshooting ATMs, applications, and software/hardware compatibility problems.

roles.title: Deskside and Application Support
roles.description: Provides expert IT advice and support to internal employees, manages incident and change management processes, and delivers onsite technical support.

roles.title: Network Administrator
roles.description: Maintains, troubleshoots, and administers LANs, WANs, mainframe networks, and workstations. Leads network infrastructure staff and collaborates on security upgrades.

roles.title: Network Infrastructure Technician
roles.description: Monitors network infrastructure, applies approved changes, documents outcomes, and supports tier 2 and tier 3 incidents.

roles.title: Information Security Analyst/Specialist
roles.description: Protects IT infrastructure from intentional or unintentional breaches, detects threats, reports on incidents, and recommends security enhancements.

roles.title: Junior Network Architect
roles.description: Assists in implementing and testing network solutions, builds and tests updates, and follows documentation procedures.

roles.title: IT Technician
roles.description: Sets up, manages, and troubleshoots technology systems in an organization, providing technical support.
